meanings.definition: A type of paint or fiber made from a synthetic resin.
meanings.sent1: I used acrylic to paint a colorful picture in art class.
meanings.sent2: The artist preferred using acrylic for their abstract paintings.
meanings.sent3: The acrylic paint decided to have a party with the watercolors.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was an acrylic canvas, vibrant and bold.
meanings.sent5: The acrylic fibers shimmered in the sunlight, like a rainbow.

meanings.definition: A synthetic material made from acrylic acid or its derivatives.
meanings.sent1: The blanket was so soft because it was made of acrylic.
meanings.sent2: The sweater was cozy and warm, thanks to the acrylic material.
meanings.sent3: The acrylic fabric whispered jokes to the cotton and wool.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like acrylic, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The acrylic material gleamed like polished glass, smooth and flawless.
